sentences.en: A stark , rocky promontory towered over a stand of majestic pines.
sentences.cn: 一片悬崖高耸在一片巍巍的松树之上.

sentences.en: Anna looked tanned and majestic in her linen caftan.
sentences.cn: 安娜穿着亚麻长袍，衬出其棕色的皮肤，显得十分高贵。
他穿上军装显得很威风.

sentences.en: I have, however, seen a superbly majestic and beautiful sunrise.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我却看到了一次最雄伟、最瑰丽的日出景象.

sentences.en: In the distance rose the majestic Alps.
sentences.cn: 远处耸立着雄伟的阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: In the distance we saw the majestic Rocky Maintains.
sentences.cn: 我们望见了远处巍峨的落基山脉.

sentences.en: Presently a sea - smell reached the nostrils and the river , ever majestic, flowed into the sea.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿,一般海水的腥味钻进鼻孔, 河水滔滔地汇入大海.

sentences.en: She presented a more majestic spectacle than Stockholmers had ever seen before.
sentences.cn: 她呈现出斯德哥尔摩人从未见过的壮丽景色.

sentences.en: She was standing by him at her full height, in quiet majestic self - possession .
sentences.cn: 她正挺直着身子站在他身边,神情严肃, 沉静, 自制.

sentences.en: The other pirates envied him this majestic vice, and secretly resolved to acquire It'shortly.
sentences.cn: 旁边的两个海盗看着他这副十分气派的痞相,非常羡慕, 暗下决心,尽快学会这一招.
在仪表上,他们是威严的.

sentences.en: This lovely village is surrounded by majestic mountain scenery.
sentences.cn: 这座美丽的村庄四周山色壮丽。

sentences.en: This poem is both majestic and sonorous.
sentences.cn: 这首诗读起来音调铿锵.

words.tran_cn: 威严；最高权威，王权；雄伟；权威

trans.tran_cn: 宏伟的，壮丽的，庄重的，磅礴
